original: Kjällman, Gunnar Gösta Hampus, advokat, Visby, f. 18/6/00 i Kävlinge, Malmöh. 1., av förste stat:skriv. P. J. K. o. Ida Dittlau. G. 30 m. Birgit Gardsten. Barn: Leif f. 32, Gunilla 36. — Stud:ex. i Lund 20, jur. kand. där 25. Anst. å adv :byrå i Lund 25-26, e. o. not. i hovr. över Skåne o. Blek. 25 o. i Svea hovr. 26, tingstjg. i Gotl. s. härads doms. 27-29, tf. stadsfogde i Lund tidvis 26-27, egen adv:-verksamh. i Visby sed. 29, e. stifts-aman. där 29-33, därunder tf. stifts-sekr. nio mån. Omb :man h. A-B Gotl. Bank i Visby sed. 32, sekr. i Gotl. hand:kamm. sed. 36, v. auditör v. Gotl. trupper 37-42, auditör v. Gotl. inf :reg. o. Gotl. art:kår sed. 42. Verkst. dir. o. styr :led. i A-B Lindströms Järnhandel, styr:led. i A-B Visby Motor-central, Visby Kafé A-B, Ångf. A-B Gotl. o. A-B Visby Stadshotell, styr:- stippl. i A-B Gofcl. Banik, ord’f. i bar-11 av :ndn sed. 32, led. aiv stadsfulilm, sed. 36, v. ordf. i’ polisndn sed. 42, led. av soc. ii:dii. Led. av Sv:es advisamf. 30.
translated: Kjällman, Gunnar Gösta Hampus, lawyer, Visby, b. 18/6/00 in Kävlinge, Malmöhus county. Son of first state secretary P. J. K. and Ida Dittlau. Married on 30/xx/1920 to Birgit Gardsten. Children: Leif, b. 1932, Gunilla, b. 1936. Completed high school in Lund in 1920, obtained a law degree there in 1925. Employed at a law firm in Lund from 1925-1926, acting notary at the Court of Appeals for Skåne and Blekinge in 1925, and at Svea Court of Appeals in 1926. Served as a court clerk in Gotland's Southern District Court from 1927-1929, acting city bailiff in Lund intermittently from 1926-1927. Established own law practice in Visby in 1929, assistant diocesan steward there from 1929-1933, including nine months as acting diocesan secretary. Board member of A-B Gotland Bank in Visby since 1932, secretary of Gotland Chamber of Commerce since 1936, assistant auditor for Gotland troops from 1937-1942, auditor for Gotland Infantry Regiment and Gotland Artillery Corps since 1942. Executive director and board member of A-B Lindström's Hardware Store, board member of A-B Visby Motor Center, Visby Café A-B, A-B Gotland Steamship Co., and A-B Visby City Hotel. Board chairman of a local newspaper since 1932, member of the city council since 1936, vice chairman of the police board since 1942, member of the social welfare board. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1930.

organization.name: Court of Appeals for Skåne and Blekinge
